relation: アメリカ合衆国New York CIty

Master's Program for Orchestra Musicians In this two-year course for orchestra musicians, the ACCADEMIA TEATRO ALLA SCALA offer students the opportunity to acquire a wealth of exclusive experience at no charge, actually providing a monthly stipend. The program provides training and artistic development in concert, opera and ballet repertoires through direct orchestral, ensemble, and chamber music performance experience. Numerous occasions to perform on the world's premier stages are offered every year. Guest Conductors 2015/17: Fabio Luisi, Adam Fischer, David Coleman, Pietro Mianiti, Massimiliano Murrali. Read now the Announceme PDFのダウンロード

Youth Philharmonic Orchestra Youth Philharmonic Orchestra is a non-profit organization, which aims to bring together the youth from all over the world to represent their voice through music. These young music talents will have opportunity to play their part on that very same day when their president is representing their country at United Nations in New York. With this united aim Youth Philharmonic Orchestra aims to present a voice sample to the world with an orchestra consisting of voice of united nations. PDFのダウンロード

European Youth Music Week 2015 Challenging works for orchestra are the main focus for this summer course in the middle of Germany. Course members will benefit from the fantastic facilities at the music academy in Schlitz. The English-German team of conductors will make shure you'll have much fun with Berlioz "Symph fantastique", Rachmaninov 2nd Symph, Copland's "Billy the Kid" and other works for chamber and string orchestras. Expect course students from more than 10 European countries aged 15 to 26. This year's bonus: a weak Euro. Sounds very much like a bargain. Apply now in order to avoid disappointment.

MA in Scoring for Film & Digital Media Pulse College in association with the DIT Conservatory of Music & Drama, new Masters in Scoring for Film & Visual Media. This unique course is taught by critically-acclaimed composers in a world class facility at Windmill Lane Recording Studios. PDFのダウンロード

LMFL Course: Centre International de Valbonne - Sophia Antipolis An advanced level course for+17 years old -in Provence (near Nice ) /Master classes with Alexander and Albert Markov, (violin) , Steven Honigberg (cello) Opera workshop Chamber Music/ Brass ensemble Piano with Prof; Rustem Koudoyarov - Concerts
